Package fr.cnrs.iees.omhtk.utils

package fr.cnrs.iees.omhtk.utils
Generic utilities developed at the Ecole Normale Sup√©rieure Ecology Laboratory when it existed.
  • logging facilities
  • mathematical intervals
  • on-the-run statistics
  • manipulation of Strings
  • n-uples

A lot of this code is probably redundant with existing libraries by now, but at the time of development of this package they were not.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 19 mai 2021
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Duple<F,​S>
    A class holding a pair (in the mathematical sense, ie ordered) of objects of possibly different classes.
    Interval
    A (simple) class for mathematical intervals.
    Logging
    A centralized logging system for big applications.
    NameUtils
    Utility methods to make java-compatible names from Strings.
    NiceScale
    http://erison.blogspot.com/2011/07/algorithm-for-optimal-scaling-on-chart.html.
    Permute
    The Steinhaus, Johnson and Trotter algorithm for generating permuted indices.
    Shuffle
    Shuffle methods.
    Statistics
    Functions to compute statistics iteratively.
    Tuple<F,​S,​T>
    A class holding a triplet (in the mathematical sense, ie ordered) of objects of possibly different classes.
    UniqueString
    A factory for unique Strings.
    UnzipUtility
    This utility extracts files and directories of a standard zip file to a destination directory.
